response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering this opportunity at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your potential to benefit greatly from our product. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
